sequence:
Red Spider Lily's Love

<size=45>Chapter 5 - A Small Scar</size>

scripts.say: I'm sorry it's come to this. Our designated cook called in sick today... I will make her pay dearly for causing you so much trouble, Commander...

On second thought, though, I should be thanking her for giving me the chance to cook together with you~! *Giggle*... Kaga would've simply done everything on her own, so I am the only one who gets to experience this...
Ahh... You look magnificent when you cook, Commander... I can't help but swoon just watching you...
Akagi was staring at me so intently... I got distracted and cut my finger.
How could this happen... Did someone tamper with the knife?! Or are there people in here trying to distract you...?!
This will not do. I've taken measures to ensure no one can sneak into the office, but I overlooked the canteen as you don't come here often...
I cannot be by your side around the clock, so I'll need to ask someone for help... No, no, she might use that as an excuse to share your bed...

options.content: Use a bandage to cover the wound

scripts.say: Ah, I've got it! I'll just chain you to your bed so that we will never be apart... I'll ask Akashi to makeâ€” No, I'll even make the chains myself!
Commander, what do you mean by that?! Are you saying you don't need my help? You're not actually considering asking others for help when you have me, are you...?!
*Grr* ... If you're going to act tough and ignore what Akagi says, then you leave Akagi no choice...
Then, in the blink of an eye, everything went black.
I tried to move, and a fluffy sensation ran over my whole body...
It seemed she had enveloped me with her tails to prevent me from going anywhere.
Don't even think about running away. No matter what you believe, nobody loves you more than Akagi does... *Giggle*
Trapped inside her mass of tails, Akagi and I were alone.
